data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Badge,
        Button,
        Position,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Button palette="accent">
    Open Inbox
    <Position
        variation="indicator"
        placement="top"
        alignment_x="right"
    >
        <Badge
            animation="pulse"
            palette="negative"
            shape="pill"
        >
            +99
        </Badge>
    </Position>
</Button>
data.title: Position Preview
